officialTitle: Prospective Trial to Evaluate MUltimodal Targeted Axillary Surgery (MUTAS) Approaches in Breast Cancer Patients With Positive Lymph Nodes.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patients correctly identified as low axillary tumor load carriers by a pre-defined systematic axillary ultrasound imaging workflow
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Node-positive breast cancer patients confirmed by biopsy or cytology
* Positivity confirmed before the surgical treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to confirm positive lymph nodes by biopsy or cytology
* Inability to understand the protocol design
* Poor understanding of the Spanish language
